Fast. Convenient Send money and buy airtime offline using your existing bank and momo accounts Link your accounts now Stax works offline Send money Request money Buy airtime Continue with Google to enjoy the full Stax experience Continue with Google Transfer money securely and easily. No extra charges. Get paid faster by clients and friends with a simple link. Top up airtime in seconds for you and your loved ones. Use Stax with or without the internet. Anytime. Anywhere. Use Stax without sign in By continuing, you agree to Stax\'s Terms of service. See how we use your data in our Privacy Policy. Hello, welcome to Stax. If you\’re new to Stax you may have some questions, lets help clarify some. Select the most relevant option to you. Is Stax for me? Already know about stax? Skip Welcome to Stax! Welcome to the Stax Community. You are officially a Staxxer. Here\'s a couple of things to get you excited about Stax. Woohoo! You\'re exactly who we\'ve been looking for! We\'ve got you covered! Here\'s a couple of things to get you excited about Stax. Automated USSD No need to remember hundreds of USSD code combinations. We\'ve figured it out for you. Be in full control of your money Manage and spend from all your banks and mobile money accounts from Stax. Safer by design We leveraged Android\'s built in security designs to keep your information secure at all times. Explore Stax Does Stax charge fees? What does Stax do? To figure out if Stax is for you select as many as best describes you I have used USSD in the past? I have more than one bank or Mobile Money account? I turn off my mobile data frequently? None of these apply Stax does not charge you extra fees. Sometimes your bank or mobile money provider will charge you fees for performing a transaction.\n\nStax keeps track of how much money they charge you. Stax uses USSD technology to make it possible for you to transact offline. With Stax, you can check your account balances, send money, buy airtime, transfer money within own accounts, control multiple financial (banks and mobile money) accounts from one app.\n\nYou can also create links that other people with Stax can use to send you money. You have more than one %1$s account. Please choose which one you want to use to %2$s. Importing channels, please wait Incomplete account setup Your %1$s account has not been fully set up. We need to fetch your accounts before you can proceed. Please run check balance to complete setup. Permissions needed Grant us phone and SMS permission. To find all your various accounts and detect transactions on those accounts, allow Stax access to your phone and SMSs. These permissions allow Stax to dial USSD codes on your behalf and create an overlay that shows you the transaction progress. In order to provide you with the ability to check your balance, transfer money or buy airtime, Stax needs your display and accessibility permission We need phone permissions to generate your support ID Grant SIM permission One last thing… Stax needs 2 permissions to %1$s. use USSD buy airtime check balance send money send money to move money Stax needs accessibility permission to %1$s Step 1 of 2: Display permission Step 2 of 2: Accessibility permission Show settings Show settings again Checking %1$s balance Buying airtime Transferring money Fetching accounts Communicating with USSD service… Transaction complete Succeeded Pending Unsuccessful this USSD service No response from %1$s. Please try again after a few seconds Security Stax meets the criteria of 740.17(b)(3) (i) security classification of the United States Bureau of Industry and Security. This software uses HTTPS for server communication; symmetric key RSA encryption to temporarily store the user\'s credentials on their own device using Android Keystore; and code obfuscation using DRM. MAP USSD FLOWS Stax will pay you USD $5 - $50 to go through a USSD flow. Get started 🗺️ MAP USSD FLOWS Welcome to Money Mapper. Stax wants to make USSD easier for everyone. To bring Stax to more people in more countries, we need to map every USSD menu globally. Join Stax as a Money Mapper and earn $5 - $20 USD for every USSD transaction you successfully map. USSD menus we still need (bounties) are listed on the next page. We add new bounties often! 1. Sign in with your Google account.\n2. Find an open bounty for any of your bank or mobile money accounts.\n3. Complete the USSD transaction described on the bounty, like Check Balance or Buy Airtime.\n 4. Review the transaction details. Retry if it failed or is incomplete.\n5. Stax will review your submissions, which may take 7-10 days. \n6. You get paid at the end of each week Buy airtime for any person %1$s Buy airtime for someone else %1$s Send money to someone else %1$s Send any amount to any person %1$s on %1$s in %1$s on %2$s Move money to your %1$s account Send any amount to your own %1$s account Pay a bill%1$s from %1$s Send any amount to %1$s any business Check balance Check your balance Email Please enter a valid email address Connecting, please wait… Please ensure you have a data internet connection Please try again.
